attributes.action: Go organic and cheap for everyone
attributes.additional_details: What we eat has an impact on our bodies and mind. We realised it is probably not just us who are fighting this fight. From one hand you are trying to survive on a minimum money from another hand you are feeding yourself disease. This is the reason why I am writing about this, to persuade government to do more. We want organic with no added antioxidants, colours, emulsifiers, stabilisers, gelling agents and thickeners, flavour enhancers, preservatives or health damaging sweeteners in them.
attributes.background: The cap between rich and poor is going BIGGER in UK, this doesn’t mean people on minimum salary should continually be in food banks or eat unhealthy foods, but they eat it to survive. As a mother most important jobs for me is to look after my baby’s and make sure what they eat is healthy.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
